nodes.text: Star Wars Weekly 94: Chewbacca Betrayed by Han Solo! is the ninety-fourth issue in the Marvel UK Star Wars series of comics.

This issue includes Way of the Wookiee!, the first black & white part of the story Way of the Wookiee!, which was reprinted in color in Marvel Illustrated Books' Star Wars. It wasn't until the arrival of the Star Wars Omnibus series from Dark Horse Comics that the comic is shown in its original non-color style.
